conversation.content:
- 'Id': 2232fbbf01e94684ac18db4c531a5
  'Name': Request Inspection
  'Description': The user wants to request an inspection of their workplace
    for health and safety issues.
  'Slot':
  - 'Entity Id': e67ce4524dac47cbb9de04b91d24c
    'Entity Name': department
    'Description': The department or area of the workplace to be inspected.
  - 'Entity Id': 9711cf0ce2c04e4f852a5c669afd4
    'Entity Name': inspection_type
    'Description': The type of inspection requested.
    'Examples':
    - safety
    - hygiene
    - fire
    - ' ergonomic'
- 'Id': cf61857a897b4134bf5401ffc89e6
  'Name': Discuss Final Pay
  'Description': The user has questions about their final paycheck or benefits
    payout.
  'Slot':
  - 'Entity Id': 4c1c83aa6be6462a963f4a9492282
    'Entity Name': pay_type
    'Description': The type of payment or benefit the user wants to discuss.
  - 'Entity Id': a44eff2b303a402aa9c9235c18a6c
    'Entity Name': pay_amount
    'Description': The expected amount of the payment or benefit.
  - 'Entity Id': bfca3c2ce64749fc8881dc81c0f80
    'Entity Name': pay_date
    'Description': The expected date of the payment or benefit.
- 'Id': 978a3db128fe4c7b80a1b5db47417
  'Name': Schedule Interview
  'Description': The user wants to set a time for the exit interview.
  'Slot':
  - 'Entity Id': d4980e3271724da788530bd2d5cb0
    'Entity Name': date
    'Description': The specific day for the exit interview.
  - 'Entity Id': 0983983c212948e990e83b70de073
    'Entity Name': time
    'Description': The specific time for the exit interview.
    'Examples':
    - 09:00 AM
    - 10:00 AM
    - 11:00 AM
    - 01:00 PM
    - 02:00 PM
    - 03:00 PM
- 'Id': b58ac83224134dad9e4cd8efdb786
  'Name': Change Contact Info
  'Description': The user needs to update their contact information for future
    communication.
  'Slot':
  - 'Entity Id': 37abc7b1a9634cd1926e916824bc8
    'Entity Name': contact_type
    'Description': The type of contact information to be updated.
  - 'Entity Id': 914d8901ad4542cda2e7655e688eb
    'Entity Name': new_info
    'Description': The new contact information that will replace the old one.
- 'Id': 5f678474bce14305a3cef281384ad
  'Name': N/A
  'Description': The user input does not apply to any of the above
